dashboard.legalSubheading: Edit contracts per role and force a new acceptance cycle after publishing.

dashboard.legalEditorHelp: Use the editor to update text and preserve formatting.
dashboard.legalPreviewHint: This is how the contract will appear to users when they open the dashboard on mobile.
dashboard.legalEmptyState: There are no saved versions for this role yet.
dashboard.legalPendingNotice: Users with that role will be asked to accept the new version.
dashboard.legalOverlayBody: Before continuing you must read and sign the version that is active for your role.
dashboard.legalOverlayCheckbox: I have read and accept the contract terms
dashboard.legalOverlayError: You must accept the contract to continue.

dashboard.recommendationWhyOrder: Order & action are at {percent}. Schedule deliberate interventions to keep unlock the next phase.

footer.description: Consulting firm for ontological coaching for leaders, teams and organizations who need to sustain change.
footer.mantra: We do not change people. We change how you observe and decide.

contactForm.successMessage: Thanks for writing us. We'll answer shortly.

hero.title: We design the system that makes change stick.
